related_post.text: ```py"""Simple Login Page with classes  credits  ! immortal#9160 alphabet = ["a","b","c","e","f","g","h","i","j","k","l","m","n","o","p","q","r","s","t","u","v","w","x","y","z"]print("Please Login Or sign up")print("Type !signup to sign up / !login to into your account login")choice_Start = input("Choice:")while True: if choice_Start == !signup": gmail_signup = input("Gmail:") pass_signup = input("Password:") if len(pass_signup) >= 10 and pass_signup in alphabet:  break  else: print("Password is too short please make it longer or add letters") continue  ```hey i want to make it so it checks if it has 1 letter in the list please help because it says passowrd is too short please make it longer
